d.name: helm-chart-1.1.5
d.body:
## What's Changed
* fix: add PersistentVolumeClaim definition to prepare upgrade job by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6483


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/compare/v4.1.3...helm-chart-1.1.5

d.name: v4.1.3
d.body:
## Installation & Upgrade

```
helm upgrade --install -n kubesphere-system --create-namespace ks-core https://charts.kubesphere.io/main/ks-core-1.1.4.tgz --debug --wait
```

## Enhancements

- Refine the cascading deletion logic for workspace.
- Adjust the authorization rules for workspace roles.
- Optimized the display of pod list data.
- The platform-self-provisioner role will no longer allow specifying other user as administrator when creating a workspace.
- Allow users to link with multiple identity providers.
- Support manual triggering of a repository update.
- Redirect unexpected requests to the Access Denied page.
- Adjust the cluster role configuration in the Helm chart.

## Bug Fixes

- Fix the potential privilege escalation vulnerability in web kubectl.
- Fix the issue where the app release cannot be upgraded.
- Fix the compatibility issue with the prerelease K8s version number.
- Fix the configuration issue with LDAP Identity Provider for LDAPS and STARTTLS.
- Fix the issue where images could not be searched from Docker Hub and Harbor.
- Fix the issue with handling special characters in the Application Version.
- Fix the issue of unable to create ingress when the gateway extension is not installed.

## What's Changed
* [release-4.1] config/ks-core: fix the CronJob API version determination issue by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6229
* Update Chart.yaml by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6230
* [release-4.1] disable extensions-museum in member cluster by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6239
* [release-4.1] refactor: workspace cascading deletion logic by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6251
* [release-4.1] correct and clarify potentially misleading terms in the license file by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6252
* [release-4.1] fix failing unit tests by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6256
* [release-4.1] fix: there is a serious privilege escalation vulnerability in the kubectl terminal tool by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6254
* [release-4.1] fix regression bug by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6270
* [release-4.1] fix: resolve the apprelease upgrade issue by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6278
* [release-4.1] fix: make the prerelease version compatible by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6301
* [release-4.1] adjust the authorization rules for workspace roles by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6331
* [release-4.1] Fix OIDC logout redirect uri by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6351
* fix cve with upgrade telemetry 1.0.2 and go 1.22.11 by @smartcat999 in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6367
* [release-4.1] fix: pod list with owner filter logic by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6371
* feat: add category for deepseek by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6383
* fix: support LDAPS && STARTTLS by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6386
* fix: During the creation of a workspace, it will be determined whethe… by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6387
* feat(auth): support multiple identity provider associations by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6381
* [release-4.1] fix ldaps protocol by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6388
* feature: reduce telemetry dependence by @smartcat999 in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6390
* feat: platform config API by @smartcat999 in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6391
* fix: replace user displayname with annotation by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6396
* fix: incorrect redis config by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6405
* update ks-core helm chart (#6401) by @smartcat999 in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6407
* [release-4.1] Improve the readability of some codes by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6410
* Refactor FormatVersion function to handle invalid characters by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6411
* [release-4.1] Fix conflict and cherry-pick (cherry-pick from #0e8c6d5) by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6413
* Support manual triggering of a repository update. by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6414
* [release-4.1] fix: update license-eye version to v0.6.0 by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6415
* Merge master into branch release-4.1 by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6417
* fix: helm template error by @smartcat999 in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6419
* [release-4.1] Update util.go by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6424
* fix: regression bugs by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6433
* deps: update go-jose to v4.0.5 (#6435) by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6438
* chore: simplify telemetry config by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6441
* feat: add imagesearch provider by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6447
* update pod status.Phase by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6448
* Update branch to latest state by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6451
* deps: update dependencies by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6454
* chore: remove deprecated CronJob for restarting extensions museum by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6458
* Release 4.1.3-rc.0 by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6456
* Release v4.1.3 by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6459


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/compare/v4.1.2...v4.1.3

d.name: helm-chart-1.1.3
d.body:
## Installation & Upgrade

```
helm upgrade --install -n kubesphere-system --create-namespace ks-core https://charts.kubesphere.io/main/ks-core-1.1.3.tgz --debug --wait
```

## Bug Fixes

- Fix the CronJob API version determination issue.

## What's Changed
* Update build-multiarch.yaml by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6213
* [release-4.1] config/ks-core: fix the CronJob API version determination issue by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6229
* Update Chart.yaml by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6230


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/compare/helm-chart-1.1.2...helm-chart-1.1.3

d.name: v4.1.2
d.body:
## Installation & Upgrade

```
helm upgrade --install -n kubesphere-system --create-namespace ks-core https://charts.kubesphere.io/main/ks-core-1.1.2.tgz --debug --wait
```

## New Features

- Support oci-based helm chart repository.

## Enhancements

- Add the default extension repository.

## Bug Fixes

- Fix the blank page issue of some extensions.
- Fix the issue of resource residue when uninstalling ks-core.
- Fixing installation issuesin Kubernetes 1.19 environment.

## What's Changed
* [release-4.1] fix typo (#1965) by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6173
* [release-4.1] Update telemetry config by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6172
* [release-4.1] feat: add extension-museum in helm by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6174
* [release-4.1] Use responsewriter.UserProvidedDecorator instead of auto flush response by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6175
* [release-4.1] fix: cronjob.batch/v1 is invalid in k8s v1.19 by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6188
* [release-4.1] fix: graceful delete ks-core by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6189
* [release-4.1] fix: add tls when get repository index. by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6198
* [release-4.1] fix: add annotation checksum/cert to extensions-museum pod by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6202
* [release-4.1] feat: Adapt to oci-based helmchart repo by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6203
* [release-4.1] adjust the log level of unexpected exceptions by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6208
* [release-4.1] fix: remove the incorrect RBAC rule merging logic by @ks-ci-bot in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6210
* Release v4.1.2 by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6212
* Update build-multiarch.yaml by @wansir in https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/pull/6213


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kubesphere/kubesphere/compare/v4.1.1...v4.1.2
